thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Paris Hotel
thread.title_full: Fabulous Paris Hotel - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martha B
title: Fabulous Paris Hotel
text:
This smallish Hotel provided us the basis for a fabulous 4 days in Paris: a great location, great night sleep, a great breakfast to start the day (& fabulous Gluten Free + chicken options for non-meat eaters!), and a really helpful staff. Our room was stylish, functional, apparently very spacious for Paris, and the bed VERY comfortable! I would definitely stay here again.
